channel.title: Bank
channel.description: I know this is like the dumbest question but i cant figure it out rofl, How do i edit When i open the bank say the bank of my server it says the bank of ...... how do i change it to my bank?

item.title: Bank
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

another nooby, question, ./…anyway depends wat server base ur using mostly its always in client.java, but anywayz,

steps.

  1. Download windows grep
  2. install windows grep
  3. right click ur server folder
  4. select windows grep
  5. in the search thing that pop ups enter the pharse ur looking for …example “Bank of runescape” or “owner is w.e”
  6. uncheck count files first
  7. click search
  8. files will comeup, just click them once and it will show you were the pharse i located,
  9. right click the file and select edit
  10. Do, Ctrl +f search ur pharse again and replace it with ur pharse

FINAL STEP:: COMPILE!

Read full topic
